attributes.action: Ban the Gtech pro because of its unnecessary increase in plastic waste
attributes.background: The lastest Gtech vacuum cleaner, the Gtech pro, reintroduces the use of a bag for vacuuming. However the bag has a plastic non biodegradable rim. Despite the plastic rim being technically recyclable they encourage consumers to dispose of the whole bag by dropping it in the waste bin.

rejection.details:
The UK Government or Parliament can set product standards, but is not responsible for banning individual products.

You could sign this petition calling on a ban on the importation and manufacture of non-biodegradable plastics if it is something you would like to see happen.

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/229720
